name: Ecclesia of the Black Dragon
text:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can banish this card (until the End Phase), and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Fallen of Albaz" or 1 Level 4 or lower monster that mentions it from your Deck or GY. If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 Level 8 Fusion Monster in your GY or banishment and 1 card on the field; shuffle both and this card into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Ecclesia of the Black Dragon" once per turn.
